document.forum_title: National security expert: Trump saying Obama is the ‘founder of ISIS’ is ‘just plain nuts’ [Video]
document.discussion_title: Deadly blast at China power plant [Video]
document.topic_text: More than 20 people have been killed in an explosion at a power plant in central Hubei province. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
document.post: praying for families impacted. this is horrible I'm sure it could've been prevented.
